snippet: Yaya Touré was named African Footballer of the Year for the fourth time in a row.
abstract: Midfielder Yaya Toure, who plays for Manchester City and Ivory Coast, is named African Footballer of the Year; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yaya Touré was named African Footballer of the Year for the fourth time in a row.

headline.main: Touré Wins Honor for Fourth Time
headline.print_headline: Touré Wins Honor for Fourth Time
